content.text: Hey there! How are you doing this evening?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks for asking! I'm a little nervous because tomorrow is my first day of safety patrol, but I'm excited for the challenge!
Oh wow, safety patrol! That sounds like a really important job! What do you do as a safety patroller?

Well, I'll be helping to keep kids safe at school. I'll be watching for traffic and making sure that kids are crossing the street safely. I'll also be helping out in the classroom and monitoring the hallways.
That sounds like a really important job! You must be a very responsible person!
Haha, thanks! I try my best to be responsible. I like to help people, so this is a good way for me to do that.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to be a great safety patroller.
Thanks! I hope so! What do you do for fun?
I like to go to the beach and take my cats for walks. I also like to go to Halloween parties and dress up as someone else.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I love strawberries, too! They're so sweet and juicy.
Me too! I love to eat them as a snack or use them in desserts.
I like to eat them as a snack, too. They're so good!
I'm glad we have something in common!
